Would someone update me? In 3 paragraphs or less if
possible.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> The Trial has started. Katya drops, evading the
> punches with her small 
> size. She counters with two glancing punches and a
> kick aimed at his 
> head.
> 
> Ragnar, near Rodimus, sees that he is uneasy about
> this.
> 
> Ragnar: Do not worry, Rodimus. You have to
> understand that we Clan 
> warriors are very proud. We will never follow
> someone who has not 
> proven himself, for this could demonstrate weakness.
> A weak warrior is 
> not a good leader. (He turns to look at Rodimus) But
> this Owlhawk... 
> he is strong. He does lack a bit of self-control,
> but stepped in the 
> ways of the Clans, he would be a deadly one. Katya
> knows she is likely 
> to lose, but this is more a formality. We will
> follow the Maximals.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > ::Rodimus Prime/Owlhawk::
> > 
> > Rodimus really didn't like this idea, but would go
> with it.
> > 
> > "I dont think we really have to join or follow
> each other. Working 
> as allies would be fine. However if you must do
> this, verywell. Go on 
> Owlhawk."
> > 
> > Owlhawk steps out a bit with Katya. He puts his
> fists up and starts 
> to move around a bit. A normal Maximal would
> probably wait for Katya 
> to throw the first punch, but Owlhawk is a little
> bit different.
> > 
> > Owlhawk sends two jabs at Katya's face.
> 
>
